unnormalised: **Manufacturing & Supply Chain: Enhanced Quality Control Measures Boost Exports from Tiruppur Knitwear Hub**
normalised: Manufacturing and Supply Chain: Enhanced Quality Control Measures Boost Exports from Tiruppur Knitwear Hub

unnormalised: Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu – Garment manufacturers in Tiruppur, a major knitwear export hub, are reporting a significant increase in export orders following the implementation of stringent quality control measures. Dr. Meena Iyer, Director of the Tiruppur Export Association, attributed the surge to enhanced inspection protocols and investment in modern testing equipment.
normalised: Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu – Garment manufacturers in Tiruppur, a major knitwear export hub, are reporting a significant increase in export orders following the implementation of stringent quality control measures. Doctor Meena Iyer, Director of the Tiruppur Export Association, attributed the surge to enhanced inspection protocols and investment in modern testing equipment.

unnormalised: "We've seen a 20% rise in orders, particularly from European markets, after implementing the new QC standards," Dr. Iyer stated. This initiative includes mandatory fabric testing for colorfastness and shrinkage, impacting over 1000 manufacturing units across the city.

unnormalised: The enhanced procedures, partly funded by a Rs. 50 crore grant from the Ministry of Textiles, focus on minimizing defects and ensuring consistent quality. Testing labs covering 5,000 sq ft have been established near key industrial areas.
